page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE IN GT. WAKERING
page.content: A TYPICAL FAMILY IN OUR AREA CONSISTS OF A MOTHER, FATHER AND TWO CHILDREN.THE MOTHER OFTEN HAS A FULL TIME JOB AS WELL AS RUNNING THE HOME. MOST MEN COMMUTE TO THEIR JOBS BUT SOME WORK LOCALLY. THE CHILDREN ATTEND THE LOCAL PRIMARY SCHOOL OR ARE BUSSED OUT TO THE SECONDARY SCHOOL AT ROCHFORD. ONE CHILD, SARAH, WROTE THIS ABOUT HER HOME LIFE. "MY FAMILY LIVE IN A SEMI DETACHED HOUSE AND ARE REASONABLY WELL OFF. MY PARENTS BOTH WORK, MY DAD ON A FARM AND MY MUM AS A REPRESENTATIVE OF A COSMETICS FIRM. MY DAD EARNS ABOUT Â£200 PER WEEK BUT HAS TO PAY ABOUT Â£50 TO THE GOVERNMENT IN TAX. MY MUM IS ALWAYS GOING ON ABOUT FASHION BUT FASHIONABLE CLOTHES TO HER ARE FRUMPY TO ME. HEALTH IS AN IMPORTANT PART OF FAMILY LIFE AND IF YOU EAT THE WRONG THINGS YOU WILL BECOME FAT OR UNHEALTHY. WE EAT A LOT
